sub_title: EMEA Team Manager Order to Cash, SAP for accounting & CUSTOMER CARE. Dutch, Italian, Polish translator
summary:
Hallo Dear LinkedIn Society!
My name is Patricia Rogosz, I am multilingual Senior Finance & Accounting professional and customer service Team Leader and SME. 
I speak fluent Dutch, Italian, Polish and English. I'm actively looking for a new, exciting, challenging job and I'm available for new projects - permanent or temporary, to start since whenever needed. 
I'm based in Amsterdam and I'm currently working remotely for a multinational SSC located in Prague. I'm really versatile - I love to work wherever the combination of my fluency in different languages and my professional experience would guarantee my business partners the best service. 
For the past 10+ years, I have been working as multilingual financial professional and then team lead, leading and coaching teams of 20+ professionals, in The Netherlands, and in Poland, being operational within Order to Cash, Financial Accounting and Customer Service areas. Until now, I've been coordinating variety of aspects, related to the knowledge transfers from different companies worldwide to Poland and Prague. 
I've been working with General Electric, World Trade Center Amsterdam Complex' Management, Heineken and A Schulman, where I've gained a lot of valuable experience. My tasks included guiding teams through the transition process, creating knowledge transfer calendars, linguistic support - translating, creating new documentation, work instructions, policies, procedures, operationally supporting implementation of new ERP systems/solutions such as SAP FI and maintaining IFRS and GAAP standards, EU and US. 
I'm open and multi-cultural-oriented individual, which lets me work effectively and with passion, within different work environments, either individually, or in a team. I'm very self- driven and always explore thoroughly new subjects - as such 
I learn quickly and I easily pick up new skills. I would be really glad to offer you my experience and multilingual skill set, within those of your business areas, where they could turn out most useful for your company and your customers.

education.field_of_study: Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services

profile_positions.description:
Main tasks:
●	Transferring knowledge regarding accounting processes in the area of Accounts Receivable from SSC in Belgium to the newly founded one in Poznań. Creating procedures and work instructions, playing a key role in the training and development of new team members (ca. 7 – 10 up to 20 junior/senior accountants); implementing SAP
●	Reporting and reconciliation activities: performing AR inter-company reconciliation; follow-up and managing AR ledger accounts (AR/GL, transits, etc.), preparing month end reconciliations, producing monthly reporting
●	Billing – creating, processing and sending out manual invoices and/or credit notes for corrections
Additional tasks: 
●	Allocating cash: bank accounting: processing daily AR and AP payments. investigating payment discrepancies 
●	Collection activities: performing collection actions (sending dunning letters, phone calls to customers and/or customer service); follow-up on outstanding queries/disputes in OnGuard (Collection tool); follow up on customer payments, payment plans and escalations if necessary 
●	Credit risk related activities: unblocking orders in line with the credit policy and escalating to analysts when needed. Performing credit analysis for credit limits below 50K EUR; preparing documentation for credit insurance or collection agency/lawyers (depending on customer situation) 
Customer service - related activities: 
●	Organizational and interpersonal tasks – interviewing candidates based on project requirements, resource management, training and overall project coordination
●	Client and project management – providing daily status updates, presenting weekly and quarterly business review metrics, facilitating seamless transition between projects and teams, project scheduling. 
●	Building teams ground-up –during transition coaching and managing personally and virtually 7-10 up to 20 team members across Belgium and Poland
profile_positions.title: Team Manager ORDER TO CASH for EMEA

profile_positions.description:
•Posting and allocating payments, reconciling bank statements against GL, maintaining AR customers’ files and records, performing intercompany reconciliations, billing - generate and send – out invoices, month –end closure activities and reporting
•Ensuring timely solution to different kinds of credit risk and collections issues, unblocking orders on hold, sharing best practices and helping to implement and improve the systems, procedures, daily work-routine and processes
profile_positions.title: Senior OtC Administrator - Dutch & Flemish

profile_positions.description: •Leading and managing operations on a variety of projects including the coordination of a team consisting of 3 translators
profile_positions.title: Project Manager / Translator

profile_positions.description:
•Performing entirety of accounting activities related to the new projects, new tenants of WTC’s offices; coordinating daily work of a team of 6 real estate agents
•Posting banks, performing AR intercompany reconciliations, cheques and payments via credit cards, performing credit collections activities on a daily basis
•Chairing presentations to senior managers related to progression and targets as well as the improvement 
of Accounts Receivable workflows, systems, practices and procedures
•Carrying out billing, collection and reporting activities according to specific deadlines
profile_positions.title: Contract Manager Dutch & Flemish (via RH Accountemps)

•	Support for continuous improvement of interface with Customer, Sales and Supply Chain Management 
•	Support for several projects: e.g.: Six Sigma project “Pro-activeness of Customer Service Centre”
